Address.value: 2002 TIMBERLOCH PLACE,SUITE 550, THE WOODLANDS, Texas, 77380, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: MIND Technology Inc provides technology and solutions for exploration, survey, and defense applications in oceanographic, hydrographic, defense, seismic and security industries. Its Klein and Seamap units design, manufacture and sell specialized, high performance sonar and seismic equipment. Its only operating segment being Marine Technology Products. The company's geographical segments include United States; Europe, Russia & CIS; Middle East & Africa; Asia-Pacific; and Canada & Latin America.
